alert.note: Alert for Morton; Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 04 at 6:33PM CST until March 05 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE RISK SATURDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM CST SATURDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 074... 075...076...084...085 AND 086... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 074...075... 076...084...085 AND 086... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton... Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens and Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
